runs.comm: fuller length pitching on off stump and Dilshan gets forward to drive, with Faf du Plessis cutting it off at mid off
back of a length pitching outside off stump. Dilshan content to let it through to the keeper
back of a length pitching on middle and leg. Dilshan looks to swipe this through the off side, but ends up hitting this towards the leg side
short ball from Tsotsobe and Dilshan gets on the back foot and slams this behind square for a 78-meter six. What a way to get off the mark!
short of a length ball pitching outside off. Dilshan gets forward and plays a 'dilscoop' over his head for another boundary. Dilshan seems to have got the measure of the pitch
back of a length ball pitching outside off stump, and Dilshan does it again, with another dilscoop over his head that goes through the fine leg region for a boundary
fuller length ball on middle and Jayawardene gets forward to clip this through square leg for a boundary. South Africa under the cosh early on
back of a length ball, this time pitching outside off, and Jayawardene waits on it on the back foot before steering this through third man for another boundary. Sri Lanka on the charge!

length ball pitching on off stump and Jayawardene steps into it before angling the ball behind square, and past backward square leg, for the third consecutive boundary of the over. What can Morkel do next?
short ball pitching outside off and slanting in. Jayawardene defends this to mid on for the first dot ball of the over
back of a length pitching outside off stump and Jayawardene drives this to extra-cover
short ball pitching outside off and Jayawardene cuts this square, with cover stopping most of it as it trickles outside the inner ring
length ball on middle stump and Dilshan defends back to the bowler

fuller length pitching wide of off stump and Dilshan has all the time in the world to drive this through extra-cover for yet another boundary. South Africa losing the plot here as they need to cut down the amount of boundaries
back of a length on off stump and Dilshan pushes this to mid off
fuller length outside off and Dilshan hammers this through mid off but Faf du Plessis is able to dive fully to his right to stop an inevitable boundary. Great fielding from the South African captain
length ball pitching on off stump and Dilshan pulls this through midwicket for a couple
length ball again on middle and Dilshan swivels to pull this behind square. Almost carries for four but is reined in by the boundary rider
fuller length pitching outside off and Jayawardene drives this elegantly through extra-cover for four. Lovely languid stroke from Mahela as it was in the slot
short ball on middle and off and Jayawardene plays this close to the body before setting off for a quick single
pitched up and on middle, Dilshan works it wide of mid-on for a single
full delivery outside off stump. Jayawardene plays a lofted inside-out shot over cover for another boundary. Lovely shot from Mahela
back of a length delivery pitching outside off and Mahela is beaten as it goes past the outside edge
fuller delivery wide of off stump and Mahela presses forward to drive this through extra-cover
back of a length on middle and Jayawardene steps down to chop this through third man for a single
free hit length ball pitching outside off stump and Dilshan looks to smash this on the back foot through extra-cover, but goes straight to the JP Duminy
fuller length ball pitching outside off and Dilshan waits on it on the back foot before heaving this over midwicket for a boundary
short of a length and angling across Dilshan, he clears his left leg and smears it wide of mid-wicket for another boundary
length ball on middle stump and Dilshan plays this towards point before the pair scamper for a quick single. Jayawardene, running to the danger end, is almost in trouble, but gets through safely
short ball on middle and leg and Jayawardene dances down before uppercutting this over the keeper's head with a boundary through the third man region
bouncer from Parnell on leg stump and Dilshan looking to whack this out of Hambantota, but is unable to get any bat on it as it rises sharply. Great take from de Kock
length ball pitching on off stump and Dilshan works this away to mid off, but du Plessis is back in the action to cut off a certain boundary
short ball pitching on leg stump. Jayawardene gets inside the line to try and work this away behind square and through fine leg, but ends up missing it. Ruled as a legal delivery
short ball again on middle and leg. Jayawardene steps back to give himself room and plays a lovely cut shot over backward point, as it races away to the boundary.

fuller length on middle and off and Jayawardene makes room before going for another inside-out shot over extra-cover. Ends up mistiming it as it spoons harmlessly to de Villiers at extra-cover. One of the more entertaining 33's you will ever see
fuller length pitching outside off. Perera defends this to the leg side
tossed up and on off, Dilshan gets forward and drives it straight to the fielder at cover
tossed up and on off, Dilshan gets forward and drives it straight to the fielder at cover
loopy delivery outside off. Dilshan steers this between extra-cover and mid off but is stopped by du Plessis
flighted and on off, Dilshan gets forward and eases it to long of
fuller delivery on middle. Perera works this away to the leg side
floated on the off-stump line, driven towards long off for a single
short and wide from Wiese. Perera slashes this over cover but ends up holing out to sweeper cover. Another tame dismissal from Kusal
full delivery on off stump and Chandimal defends to the bowler
fuller length on off stump and angling in. Chandimal works this through mid on for a single
back of a length on middle and leg, just straying down the pads. Dilshan glances this behind square
short ball pitching outside off and Chandimal gets back to pull this through midwicket

back of a length ball angling down the pads and Dilshan helps this on its way through fine leg. Tsotsobe, running in from a squarish position, is unable to intercept as the ball carries to the boundary
full, flighted delivery on middle and off. Chandimal presses forward to push this through mid off for a single
back of a length ball, spinning away from the batsman and Dilshan waits on it before pulling this through midwicket for yet another boundary
Tahir tosses one on off, Dilshan gets forward and slices it to deep cover for a single
length ball pitching outside off and Chandimal works it away square
fuller length on leg stump and Dilshan pushes this to long on
full delivery again on middle, Chandimal stretches forward to clip this through long on
on a good length and just outside off, Chandimal gets behind the line and defends it
short ball pitching outside off. Chandimal pulls this to midwicket
full delivery on leg stump and Dilshan helps this on its way to fine leg
slower ball pitching outside off and Chandimal works this to long on
smart bowling from Wiese, he sees Dilshan getting in position for the dilscoop so he fires in a slower ball just outside off which Dilshan can not connect with
full delivery on off and middle. Dilshan strides forward to drive this to mid off
length ball pitching outside off and slanting in. Chandimal gets forward and drives this to long on
length ball pitched outside off. Dilshan drives this straight to extra-cover
short of a length and outside off, Dilshan runs it down towards third man
back of a length and on the pads, Chandimal looks to flick and misses
length ball pitching outside off and angling in. Chandimal defends off the back foot
short ball pitching outside off and Chandimal waits on the back foot as he tries to slash this over the covers for a boundary, but is unable to get any bat on it
length ball pitching on off stump. Dilshan plays this straight to mid off

short of a length pitching outside off. Dilshan works this to mid on and sets off for a quick single. Chandimal, running to the danger-end, is lucky to miss a direct hit from the fielder. 50 up for Dilshan
fuller length outside off and Chandimal, who is positioned to hit this over midwicket, ends up getting an edge which deflects through third man for a four
short of a length on middle and leg. Chandimal tries to work this to square leg but can't get any bat on it

bouncer from Wiese outside off and Chandimal plays a pull shot which gets a top-edge that carries to fine leg. Tsotsobe, waiting under it, makes a complete mess of it as it bobbles out of his hands. The second time he has let down in the field
fuller delivery wide of off stump and Dilshan tries to steer this square on the off side, but doesn't get any bat on it
skids through, he makes room and cuts him wide of point
fetches one from wide outside off and sweeps, mistimes it to square leg
Chandimal fails to make SA pay dearly for that let-off the last over, Tahir tosses it up and slows it down, he comes down the pitch to smash it out of here, beaten in flight
fullish outside off and he works it down to midwicket
flatter delivery and he comes forward and drives to short cover where Parnell does well to dive and stop it
drives this one towards sweeper cover for a single
length ball on middle and leg and Dilshan gets down to play a reverse/dilscoop over third man for a boundary. Inventive shot from Dilshan!
length ball pitching on off stump, angling away. Dilshan pushes this through cover for a single
length ball on off stump. Mathews drives this to long off
length ball pitching just outside off. Dilshan tries to once again dilscoop over the keeper but because of the slower ball and low bounce, he is unable to get the shot off
back of a length on leg and middle. Mathews plays a pull shot behind square to get a boundary
length ball on off stump. Mathews gets forward to drive this to long off
length ball pitching just outside off and turning in. Seems to surprise Mathews as he works this away to mid on
fuller length just outside off, this time spinning away. Dilshan tries to steer this behind point, but finds the fielder
full and on the pads, Dilshan looks to sweep and misses, the ball rolls off the pads towards the onside
pushed through by Tahir, Mathews waits on it, opens the face of the bat and steers it past short third man for a brace
length ball pitching outside off and Mathews tries to steer this through the off side but finds point
Tahir slows one on off and gets it to spin across Mathews, he dabs it in front of point, wants a single and is sent back by Dilshan
full delivery on the pads and Dilshan works it behind square
wide delivery outside off and Mathews waits on it before dispatching it behind square on the off side for a boundary
length ball on middle and Mathews, looking to work this to the leg side, but the ball ends up hitting the bottom-edge of the bat and drags on to the stumps. Quite an innocuous way to get out
fuller delivery, wide of off stump. Perera times this beautifully to long off to get off the mark
full delivery on leg and Dilshan able to clip this to midwicket
full delivery just outside off and Perera drives this straight down the ground for a single
back of a length on middle and leg. Perera nudges this to the leg side for a single. Dilshan wants the strike
back of a length outside off and Dilshan tries to hammer this through midwicket, but doesn't time it well enough. Dilshan now has the highest score by a Sri Lankan against South Africa in a T20I
back of a length angling towards the slips. Perera works this to deep midwicket
full toss on off stump and Dilshan waits on it before helping it on its way behind square for a boundary. Square leg had been brought up so that helped make this shot possible

fuller length pitching outside off stump and Dilshan waits on the back foot before heaving this to deep mid wicket. De Villiers, stationed there, bobbles the return as the pair are able to complete three runs
tad fuller and on off, Perera moves across and flicks it to long on for a single
slower ball outside off and Perera, looking to play an improvised dilscoop over fine leg, is unable to get it off
full and wide and Perera has to reach for it in order to make a good connection as the ball flies through extra cover for a boundary
length ball on off stump and Perera waits on the back foot before hitting a huge blow over Duminy at long on for a six. Sri Lanka now need 17 off 15

full and wide again from Parnell and Perera is doing the deed as he reaches out again and hits this through extra-cover, beating the boundary rider who is running in from a squarish deep cover position
length ball outside off and Perera able to chip this over the covers for a boundary behind square that just beats the fielder
Parnell bangs one short, but it is a bit too high, wide called
full and on off, Perera drills it back past the bowler, gets back for the second run. 21 runs from the over, making it the most expensive of the series

And it's all over! Dilshan plays a lofted sweep shot behind square from a delivery that was pitched full and just outside off. He times it well enough to heave it over fine leg for a six which ends the contest and gives the Sri Lankans a six-wicket win, with 11 balls to spare. What a fabulous knock from Dilshan!
